message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at $9500. After considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8800 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
